content.rendered:
If you are looking for gym gloves with full palm protection that will prevent you from getting calluses or blisters, this is the pair for you. Built-in wrist wraps keep your hands steady and comfortable while you lift, and adjustable velcro wraps around your wrists to give you the perfect fit.

What’s new:

  • Equipped with anti-skid Hexagonal gel to increase the grip during intense gym workouts.
  • Our new ultralight breathable fabric wicks sweat, keeping your hands cool and dry.
  • Palm area comes with extra padding for increased pressure capacity & comfort.
  • Resistant to dangerous chemicals, water, heat, oil and aging.
  • Longer straps for extra wrist support.
  • Larger fins for easy removal.
  • Extra threading for better grip.

excerpt.rendered:
Hands get sweaty during a workout. When they do, your hands can slip. Our gym gloves, made from high-quality leather improve your grip on weights and preserve the appearance of your hands by preventing calluses and blisters.

Our gloves also wrap around your wrists providing valuable support and preventing injuries while they support heavyweights. They are also extra padded to increase the pressure capacity on your hands.
